St._Charles.Fort Zumwalt East High School:
Fort Zumwalt East High School, also known as FZE, is the fourth high school in the Fort Zumwalt School District, and is located in Saint Peters, Missouri, United States.
The school first opened to freshman and sophomore students on August 20, 2007. Encompassing 43 acres (170,000 m2) formerly known as Koenig's Farm, the five-story property was built with funds from a no-tax increase bond issue.
